overview: The film follows Isabella, a young girl whose bright imagination brings to life the Goatbird, AKA the Zorchavis, a creature that lurks in the woods around their home. She takes it upon herself to dress and act like the monster until one day her father brings it home with him, shattering her interpretation of what the monster was inside her head. The film explores Isabella's imagination and her family's struggle to put food on the table.
title: The Zorchavis
